title: EMOTIONAL HYPNOTIC CRISIS / NON-VERBAL HYPNOSIS
description:
In this video, Dr. Marco Paret's students are practicing the non-verbal hypnosis techniques that they learned in his masterclass. The subject entered a deep state of emotional hypnotic crisis. A crisis is helpful for healing past negative experiences and traumas. The subject needs to face her fears, in order to live them in the past. The more she was moving her body, the more deeply she was entering in the trance. Learn all of these powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school.
